title: Keyboard and mouse randomly stop working while running new league client
body: Ever sense I installed the new league client beta every 2 or 3 games my keyboard and mouse stop working. I cant even ctrl+alt+del out of it. The only option is to hard restart my computer.  This doesnt happen with any other games I play. It happened once while I was surfing the web, but league was open in the background looking for a match. All of my drives are updated and I do not run any 3rd party software while I play League. I also blew out my keyboard and replace my mouse batteries just to be sure. The computer is less than a year old. This has caused me to receive leaver buster multiple times and is becoming very frustrating. Dont think I should be punished for something that is 99% likely to be leagues fault but that is neither here nor there. I see someone else had this problem years ago but have found nothing on it recently. Is anyone else having these issues with the beta. Its never happened before I installed it. Any suggestions on something else it might be on my end? Any input is appreciated.

replies.body:
It sounds like your config may have become corrupt.  Try resetting it and test it in a custom game.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

Let me know if it works!
So far so good thought I haven't been able to play the last few days. I haven't had the problem in the few games I have played. Thanks again for the help.
